description:
Exposing the text of GDPR as a linked data resource, and creating a SKOS vocabulary of relevant GDPR terms and concepts.

GDPRtEXT is comprised of two contributions:
- the first is a linked data version of the GDPR defined by extending the European Legislation Identifier (ELI) ontology.
- The second is a taxonomy of terms from GDPR exposed as `skos:Concept`.

The publication (see below) also provides a mapping of the GDPR with its predecessor, the Data Protection Directive (DPD) in terms of obligations.
name: GDPRtEXT
